name: Cakewalk AEO
description: The AI agent that gets your content cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini—and ranked on Google
tagline: Traffic to Your Site. On Autopilot.
subheadline: The AI agent that gets your content cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini—and ranked on Google. Set it once. Watch traffic grow.

hero.headline: Traffic to Your Site. On Autopilot.
hero.subheadline: The AI agent that gets your content cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini—and ranked on Google. Set it once. Watch traffic grow.

problemStrip: SEO takes forever. AI search is exploding. You don't have time to figure out both. Now you don't have to.

opportunity.headline: AI Search Is Wide Open. And Nobody's Optimizing For It.
opportunity.description: Millions now ask ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini instead of Google. When AI answers, it cites sources—and that traffic goes somewhere.
points: Almost nobody is optimizing for AI citations yet
Results happen in weeks, not months
One citation can outperform a page-one Google ranking
opportunity.cta: Cakewalk finds these opportunities and captures them for you. Automatically.

valueProps.title: Fully Automated
valueProps.description: No briefs. No writers. No waiting. The system researches, creates, publishes, tracks, and optimizes—24/7.

valueProps.title: AI-First Optimization
valueProps.description: Built for the new search landscape. Get cited by AI where competition is low and results are fast. Google rankings included.

valueProps.title: Self-Learning
valueProps.description: Tracks its own results. Improves automatically. Every piece of content gets smarter over time.

howItWorks.title: Connect
howItWorks.description: Link your site and analytics (2 minutes)

howItWorks.title: Discover
howItWorks.description: We find AI prompts and keywords in your space

howItWorks.title: Deploy
howItWorks.description: The agent creates content optimized to get cited and ranked

howItWorks.title: Grow
howItWorks.description: Traffic increases while you do other things

automatedProcess.headline: The Full Process — Automated
automatedProcess.subheadline: Everything required to grow traffic. Running daily.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: Finding AI prompts your audience is asking. Researching keywords. Reviewing competitor citations. Identifying gaps.

steps.title: Analysis
steps.description: Checking performance across all content. Comparing your visibility vs. competitors. Updating strategy based on real results.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: Prioritizing high-impact opportunities. Determining what to test. Picking optimal content types.

steps.title: Execution
steps.description: Generating citation-optimized content. Building internal links. Updating search indexes.

comparison.headline: Why AEO Is Faster
comparison.footer: SEO still matters—we do that too. But AEO is where the fast wins are.

selfLearning.headline: Gets Smarter Every Day. Without You.
selfLearning.description: Most tools show you data. You figure out what to do. Then you wait months to see if it worked.
points: Tracks every piece across AI platforms and Google
selfLearning.footer: The longer it runs, the better it gets.

collectiveKnowledge.headline: Your Content Benefits from Everyone's Wins
collectiveKnowledge.description: We track thousands of queries across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and Google daily.
points: Real data on what gets cited
Your first article benefits from our thousandth

humanComparison.headline: What No Human Team Can Do

setAndForget.headline: Turn It On. Traffic Grows.
setAndForget.description: No content calendars. No writer management. No spreadsheets. No strategy meetings.
points: Connect Cakewalk. Tell it what you care about. Go run your business.
Check your dashboard when you feel like it.

testimonials.quote: First AI citation within two weeks.
0 to 12,000 organic visitors in 90 days—without publishing manually.

pricing.headline: Premium Results. Simple Pricing.
comparison: Cakewalk: A fraction of that, with better results

faq.question: How is this different from Jasper or SurferSEO?
faq.answer: Those help you create content faster. You still do everything else. Cakewalk handles the entire workflow—and it's built for AI search.

faq.question: What's AI citation tracking?
faq.answer: We track when your content gets cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini. Nobody else does this.

faq.question: How long until I see results?
faq.answer: Most users see first AI citations in 2-4 weeks.

faq.question: Will Google penalize AI content?
faq.answer: Google penalizes bad content. Ours ranks. The data proves it.

finalCta.headline: Traffic That Grows While You Sleep.
finalCta.description: The shift to AI search is happening now. Early movers will own their categories.
finalCta.subtext: No credit card required. See results in weeks.
